Pre-Game Insights: Cyprus endured an 8th consecutive defeat against Spain with a 3-1 loss in Euro 2024 qualifying.
Cyprus managed to break their goal drought with Kostas Pileas netting in the second half.
Cyprus' only win in their last 14 competitive matches came unexpectedly against Greece in the Nations League last year.
Lithuania secured their position above Bulgaria in their group in Euro 2024 qualifying.
Lithuania managed to gather four points against Bulgaria, including a notable away win in Sofia.
Lithuania posed a threat to stronger opponents, notably holding Hungary to a draw and scoring a late equalizer against Montenegro.
Cyprus manager Ketsbaia might experiment with the lineup but could call upon key players like Grigoris Kastanos.
Lithuania will miss Eligijus Jankauskas and Paulius Golubickas due to injuries, while Artemijus Tutyskinas remains a long-term absentee.
